idea-plugin.name: FMCuttingBoard
idea-plugin.description:
A JetBrains IDE plugin that helps you work with FileMaker's clipboard as XML.
When installed, the plugin adds a new "FMCuttingBoard" submenu under the IDE's Tools menu. Planned actions include: - Convert FileMaker Clipboard To XML - Read Clipboard Into New XML File - Push Clipboard Into FileMaker
This is an initial skeleton; functionality will be implemented progressively per the roadmap.
